replies.msg:
隨便狠評 大家一齊學習 200幾字around

While the government is praising the benefit brought by the commissioning of HKZMB, the claimed efforts stepping up by the government on relieving the heavy burden of transportation network are still debatable. Traffic Congestion among the three road harbour crossing is a case of it. Critics have long been arguing the overspend on HKZMB pose a tremendous threat to public fund with tiny benefits gained by the community. Before we examine the construction of HKZMB a bless or a curse , it is of paramount importance for us to investigate what the government have already been doing in a bid to eradicate the current cramped road and overwhelmed traffic..
To commence with, the government has put forward an array of recommendation on the Highway construction and expansion works such as Hiram's highway improvement work, widening of the Fanning highway and Island East Corridor Link. These huge infrastructural works has greatly received by the community. Upon commissioning of these construction, it can reduce the travel time in rush hours ,alleviate the proliferating traffic flow and also provide a better delivery of a comprehensive traffic road net. It can also bring significant impact to the boost of job opportunity during the construction period and pose a great advantage to logistics and tourism upon completion.
Furthermore, as regards traffic distribution among the three road harbour crossing, the current-term government has already commenced a feasibility study on traffic distribution to formulate toll adjustment mechanism in harbour crossing road. Also, a territory-wide consultation and review on the electronic road pricing scheme are in progress.
Section fares instead of troll adjustment mechanism
多唔多睇英文書同報紙
1/10 算係咁

愚見
用詞尚準但句子稍長 比lihkg仔下體還要長
it is of paramount importance...可改為it is vital to investigate government policy on easing heavy traffic.
那些highway與HKZMB關係不大

句子太累贅 十足p chan d 句子

O 3/7

"pose a great advantage" challenge就得,點樣擺優勢係人面前
而且點都係benefits,唔係advantages

adverb選擇方面只能夠睇多啲文執番佢...

Upon commissioning of these construction, it can reduce the travel time in rush hours ,alleviate the proliferating traffic flow and als

岩岩 skim 到
你應該 唔小心 姐

Between 其實 d 句子structure 拋到 下 人

I'm interested in judging the content only.
1. HZMB not HKZMB.
2. What is the relationship of Hiram's Highway and Fanling Highway to congestion in rush hour? Route 6, Widening of Tolo Harbor Highway are already more obvious examples. Critical radial road links nearing capacity means more than periphery roads.
3. I like how you mentioned IEC Link dropping Central-Wanchai Bypass. Better distinguish what is being built and proposed.
4. Weak link for advantages to tourism. HZMB, Heung Yuen Wai Border Control Point (logistics too) are straight up the most prominent brags by the HKSAR.
5. As a background to evaluating HZMB it seems there's not a lot of substance of possible alternatives and opportunities...

"Upon commissioning of these construction, it can reduce ..."

The commissioning of these construction helps/facilitates/benefits 之類 (?) 偶然一兩句用noun phrase會唔會順眼少少?
